column2: At the Congress of Vienna the Netherlands gained the lands of Wallonia and Flanders. The Catholic Flemish and Wallonians have long been dissatisfied with the rule of the protestant Dutch. Now they have decided to declare independence and form a new nation they call "Belgium".
The people of Texas has long been dissatisfied with our rule and now they have decided to try for their independence.

During the last few years the Greeks have become more and more restless and now their grumblings have turned into a rebellion. They have declared their independence and are now in a fullscale war against us!

During the Napoleonic wars the Portuguese court had to flee to their American colonies to escape capture. Now that the wars are over the nobles at home are calling for our return. They argue that the court can not stay in a colony and that we should return to Lisbon. Should we listen to them and go home, or do we stay? If we were to elevate the colony into a kingdom we could stay here...
A French lawyer named Orélie-Antoine came to sympathise with the natives when travelling in Patagonia. In return for his help the fools elected him king! They somehow think that this will save them.

The dream of Simón Bolívar has failed, the nation of Gran Colombia is crumbling and starting to fall apart. The north are seceding to form a nation they call Venezuela and in the south another nation called Ecuador. Do we allow our nation to fall into pieces or do we fight to keep it?

Prince Pedro of the United Kingdom of Portugal,Brazil and Algarve has proclaimed Brazil independent. The Brazilian people now has to decide if Brazil should break up like the spanish america or we should keep our Empire and crown Pedro I,constitutional emperor and perpetual defender of Brazil and unite our Empire.

The Regency is chaotic. Revolts are exploding throughout the Empire,the government is unable to act without the emperor after Pedro I's abdication. In the south,generals of the Empire proclaimed the independence of the Riograndense Republic,of course they are attacking the unity of our Empire but can we afford such civil war?

Named Irineu Evangelista de Souza,the new Baron of Mauá is now starting a new era of industries,railroads and progress to our Empire. The Projects of Mauá are great and are helping the Brazilian economy to abandon once and for all the slave labour. Maybe now we can grow stronger.

The FRCA is falling apart. The other states are dissatisfied with Guatemalan rule and have decided that their destiny is different from ours. Do we fight to keep our lands united or shall we let them go?

The recent wave of unrest that has spread throughout the German Confederation has sparked the idea of an unified German state. Many have gathered in the city of Frankfurt to discuss how such a nation would function, and most importantly: what lands it would incorporate. Two solutions have been proposed. One is the "Greater German Solution", where all of the German Confederation would be incorporated. However this would mean that we would have to abandon our lands outside the Confederation. The second solution is the so called "Smaller German Solution", where Austria is excluded from the German nation and we instead look to our lands in the east, and let Prussia lead the Germans.

Many have gathered in the city of Frankfurt to discuss how such a nation would function. The Emperor of Austria has declared his intent to stay out of the confederation. Now we are the first of the nations within the German confederation, and therefore we have been offered the crown of a unified German empire! However, the liberals in Frankfurt have a few demands before we can receive the crown. We have to give up our Prussian homeland and accept a liberal constitution. Is it worth giving up who we are just to unify Germany...earlier?

When the USA bought Louisiana from the French they got claims on lands that we consider ours. Some of our advisors have suggested that we could cede our colony of Florida in exchange for the US giving up these claims and giving us some much needed monetary aid.

The Spanish have suggested that we could purchase their colony of Florida from them. What they want in exchange is that we give up our claims on Texas that we got from the Lousiana Purchase. They also want some monetary aid.

My Emperor, we've recieved news that the french are unsatisfied with our rule and by knowing the certain defeat of facing the Roman Empire alone, they've joined Spain and Portugal and formed a new Gallic Empire and revolted again. We are now mobilizing the legions to beat the revolters. Should we proceed,my emperor?

Both Japan and Russia have long had their eyes on Sakhalin and the Kuril islands. Now it is time to sit down and decide what we are to do with them. The best solution seems to divide the islands between us, where we would get the south and the Russians would get the north.

Our American colony of Alaska is in a vurnerable position and might easily be overrun if we were to end up in a war in north America. To avoid this our advisors have suggested that we sell it to the Americans.

After the events of the Crimean War Russia had begun believing that it could not hope to protect its North American possessions in the event of another war with Britain, and had begun considering a sale of what was to become the U.S. state of Alaska. The territory was bought by the United States in 1867 at the price of 2.3 cents per acre. The Alaska purchase was widely derided in the American press of the day as 'Seward's Icebox' after then Secretary of State William H. Seward, at whose initiative the purchase was made.
